findings.title: Consider using the latest stable solidity version
findings.description: The smart contract is using an old version of solidity. It is highly recommended to use the latest stable version of solidity.

findings.title: Coding Style Issues
findings.description: Coding style issues influence code readability and may lead to bugs in future due to naming convention, indentation, and code layout issues.

findings.title: Use of different compiler versions of Solidity
findings.description: Different compiler versions of solidity are in use across various contracts and libraries.
